tweet: It is absolutely unthinkable that Speaker Pelosi held USMCA hostage for so long in pursuit of her partisan impeachment crusade against @realDonaldTrump. Today I voted against Nancy Pelosi's price fixing bill that would crush innovation & prevent patients from accessing new & life-saving drugs. As a physician, I urge my colleagues to preserve the incentives which made America a leader in finding new cures. https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/policy/healthcare/house-passes-pelosi-drug-pricing-bill-in-bid-to-show-democratic-priorities-beyond-impeachment …

The House just passed the 2020 NDAA which gives our troops the largest pay raise in a decade, maintains a $738 billion budget & includes provisions to improve Louisiana military installations including Camp Beauregard, Barksdale, Fort Polk & Belle Chasse. https://www.rollcall.com/news/democrats-got-completely-rolled-in-ndaa-talks-critics-say …

I joined 159 of my congressional colleagues to call on Speaker Pelosi to stop playing politics with our farmers and bring the USMCA trade agreement up for a vote. 

US agricultural exports alone are expected to increase by more than $2 billion annually.

On December 7, 1941, more than 2,400 Americans lost their lives when Imperial Japan attacked our naval base at Pearl Harbor. Let us never forget those who lost their lives in service to our great nation on that date which will live in infamy. https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2019/12/06/pearl-harbor-what-happened-during-december-7-1941-attack-hawaii/4351786002/ …

Having failed to build an impeachment case based on the facts, Dems have turned to the opinions of three left-leaning lawyers who donated to Dems, called for impeachment before the Ukraine call & mocked his young son from the witness stand. Any claim of objectivity is laughable.

President Trump is right: France & most of Europe need NATO more than ever. President Macron can insult NATO & the US all he wants, but it doesn't change the reality that France has dangerously underinvested in its military for decades. It’s time they started pulling their weight
